C

ChanceNode - representation中的类
Represents a node in the game's narrative structure where the next path is determined randomly.
ChanceNode(String) - 类的构造器 representation.ChanceNode
Constructs a ChanceNode with a description.
chooseNext() - 类中的方法 representation.BattleNode
Engages the player in a turn-based battle with the enemy.
chooseNext() - 类中的方法 representation.ChanceNode
Randomly chooses the next node from the available options.
chooseNext() - 类中的方法 representation.DecisionNode
Asks the player to make a decision and chooses the next node based on the player's input.
chooseNext() - 接口中的方法 representation.Event
Chooses the next node based on the current event's logic.
chooseNext() - 类中的方法 representation.InnerNode
Chooses and returns the next node to proceed to based on the current node's logic.
chooseNext() - 类中的方法 representation.Node
Determines and returns the next node based on the current node's logic.
chooseNext() - 类中的方法 representation.NodeDecorator
Delegates the choice of the next node to the wrapped node's logic.
chooseNext() - 类中的方法 representation.SoundNode
Override chooseNext methods
chooseNext() - 类中的方法 representation.TerminalNode
Since this is a terminal node, it does not lead to any next node.
